no_text: There are no tests in the language you selected. Choose other languages or submit a request to have your text added.
logout_text: Are you sure you want to log out?
modal_subtitle_1: Every day is a new chance to get better. Use it wisely and move towards success!
modal_subtitle_2: Don't be afraid to step into the unknown. The most amazing possibilities lie there!
modal_subtitle_3: Your records are already impressive, but did you know you can do even better? Try and surprise yourself!
modal_subtitle_4: Believe in yourself and your abilities. Beat your records and show everyone that you are the real winner!
modal_subtitle_5: Remember that success comes to those who are not afraid to follow it. Break your own records and become an inspiration to others!
modal_subtitle_6: The greatest achievements come to those who are not afraid to challenge themselves. Break your records and become the hero of your story!
modal_subtitle_7: Great achievements start with small steps. Keep moving forward and you can beat your records!
modal_subtitle_8: Constant growth and self-improvement are the keys to reaching new heights. Beat your own records and get better every day!
modal_subtitle_9: Don't stop there. Success awaits those who strive for more. Beat your own records and make yourself proud!
modal_subtitle_10: You've already proven that you can do a lot. But your potential is unlimited! Beat your records and unlock new opportunities!
modal_subtitle_11: Congratulations! You've outdone yourself! Incredible progress is your strength!
modal_title_1: Each step brings you closer to success!
modal_title_2: You can do whatever you want!
modal_title_3: Dreams come true if you believe in them!
modal_title_4: The hardest part is getting started. You already started!
modal_title_5: Pay no attention to doubt, move forward!
modal_title_6: Every obstacle is a chance to get stronger!
modal_title_7: Set a new record and surprise yourself!
modal_title_9: Success is a journey, not a destination!
modal_title_10: You can do anything you can imagine!
confirm_modal_title: Are you sure you want to start over?
